comments: Very easygoing, ask questions if you don\'t understand something. He has multiple ways of teaching, I made the mistake of not asking if I needed help. Gives extra credit where possible.

Bo Jittner! Seriously this guy is my favorite math teacher ever, I had him for my AP Calculus class in high school and he prepared me so well for the rest of my calculus in college. This guy is just the best.
Great professor, I wish I could have him for every Math class.

Easy to understand, and will help you in anyway he can. Attendance not mandatory, but you do get extra credit for coming to every class. Also has study sessions before the test. The only HW you have is EHw.
Best teacher ever! I got the my first "A" in math ever. I hated math but now I only dislike it.
